  2. Do you keep yours under/behind glass? I have two under renovation, and I‚Äôve had that question asked a lot ‚Äì if they‚Äôll be glassed in when done.

    (Yep. It‚Äôs in a big glass cabinet. Before that the cats would crawl inside and nest. ~ Jenny)

  6. It‚Äôs been a rough week, here at The House With No Livestock.
    Your Haunted Dollhouse posts have brought me joy.
    Thank you.

  8. Oh my God Jenny ‚Äì it‚Äôs absolutely fabulous!! How on earth did you find all of those incredible miniatures? You truly are a genius!!!üñ§

    I‚Äôm also picturing YOU finding all kinds of neat new finds along the way, knowing each item will be PERFECT for a particular room in the Haunted Doll House.
    Happy Halloween, Jenny!

    Haunted hotel, seances, Halloweentown the movies, B&Bs from Halloweentown and Twilight, witches, ghouls, you name it. See you next year!
